metadata.title: CVE-2021-45342 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
A buffer overflow vulnerability in CDataList of the jwwlib component of LibreCAD 2.2.0-rc3 and older allows an attacker to achieve Remote Code Execution using a crafted JWW document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45342` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

librecad - 2.1.3-3
librecad-data - 2.1.3-3
No subscription required

notes.note: eslerm> any jww file would not load

criterions.comment: librecad package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.3-3').
